00011   Cssize::Cssize(Context& ctx, Env* env, Backtrace* bt)
00012   : ctx(ctx),
00013     env(env),
00014     block_stack(vector<Block*>()),
00015     p_stack(vector<Statement*>()),
00016     backtrace(bt)
00017   {  }

00019   Statement* Cssize::parent()
00020   {
00021     return p_stack.size() ? p_stack.back() : block_stack.front();
00022   }
00023 
00024   Statement* Cssize::operator()(Block* b)
00025   {
00026     Env new_env;
00027     new_env.link(*env);
00028     env = &new_env;
00029     Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(b->pstate(), b->length(), b->is_root());
00030     // bb->tabs(b->tabs());
00031     block_stack.push_back(bb);
00032     append_block(b);
00033     block_stack.pop_back();
00034     env = env->parent();
00035     return bb;
00036   }

00038   Statement* Cssize::operator()(At_Rule* r)
00039   {
00040     if (!r->block() || !r->block()->length()) return r;
00041 
00042     if (parent()->statement_type() == Statement::RULESET)
00043     {
00044       return (r->is_keyframes()) ? new (ctx.mem) Bubble(r->pstate(), r) : bubble(r);
00045     }
00046 
00047     p_stack.push_back(r);
00048     At_Rule* rr = new (ctx.mem) At_Rule(r->pstate(),
00049                                         r->keyword(),
00050                                         r->selector(),
00051                                         r->block() ? r->block()->perform(this)->block() : 0);
00052     if (r->value()) rr->value(r->value());
00053     p_stack.pop_back();
00054 
00055     bool directive_exists = false;
00056     size_t L = rr->block() ? rr->block()->length() : 0;
00057     for (size_t i = 0; i < L && !directive_exists; ++i) {
00058       Statement* s = (*r->block())[i];
00059       if (s->statement_type() != Statement::BUBBLE) directive_exists = true;
00060       else {
00061         s = static_cast<Bubble*>(s)->node();
00062         if (s->statement_type() != Statement::DIRECTIVE) directive_exists = false;
00063         else directive_exists = (static_cast<At_Rule*>(s)->keyword() == rr->keyword());
00064       }
00065 
00066     }
00067 
00068     Block* result = new (ctx.mem) Block(rr->pstate());
00069     if (!(directive_exists || rr->is_keyframes()))
00070     {
00071       At_Rule* empty_node = static_cast<At_Rule*>(rr);
00072       empty_node->block(new (ctx.mem) Block(rr->block() ? rr->block()->pstate() : rr->pstate()));
00073       *result << empty_node;
00074     }
00075 
00076     Statement* ss = debubble(rr->block() ? rr->block() : new (ctx.mem) Block(rr->pstate()), rr);
00077     for (size_t i = 0, L = ss->block()->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00078       *result << (*ss->block())[i];
00079     }
00080 
00081     return result;
00082   }

00084   Statement* Cssize::operator()(Keyframe_Rule* r)
00085   {
00086     if (!r->block() || !r->block()->length()) return r;
00087 
00088     Keyframe_Rule* rr = new (ctx.mem) Keyframe_Rule(r->pstate(),
00089                                                     r->block()->perform(this)->block());
00090     if (r->selector()) rr->selector(r->selector());
00091 
00092     return debubble(rr->block(), rr)->block();
00093   }

00095   Statement* Cssize::operator()(Ruleset* r)
00096   {
00097     p_stack.push_back(r);
00098     Ruleset* rr = new (ctx.mem) Ruleset(r->pstate(),
00099                                         r->selector(),
00100                                         r->block()->perform(this)->block());
00101     // rr->tabs(r->block()->tabs());
00102     p_stack.pop_back();
00103 
00104     Block* props = new (ctx.mem) Block(rr->block()->pstate());
00105     Block* rules = new (ctx.mem) Block(rr->block()->pstate());
00106     for (size_t i = 0, L = rr->block()->length(); i < L; i++)
00107     {
00108       Statement* s = (*rr->block())[i];
00109       if (bubblable(s)) *rules << s;
00110       if (!bubblable(s)) *props << s;
00111     }
00112 
00113     if (props->length())
00114     {
00115       Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(rr->block()->pstate());
00116       *bb += props;
00117       rr->block(bb);
00118 
00119       for (size_t i = 0, L = rules->length(); i < L; i++)
00120       {
00121         (*rules)[i]->tabs((*rules)[i]->tabs() + 1);
00122       }
00123 
00124       rules->unshift(rr);
00125     }
00126 
00127     rules = debubble(rules)->block();
00128 
00129     if (!(!rules->length() ||
00130           !bubblable(rules->last()) ||
00131           parent()->statement_type() == Statement::RULESET))
00132     {
00133       rules->last()->group_end(true);
00134     }
00135 
00136     return rules;
00137   }

00139   Statement* Cssize::operator()(Media_Block* m)
00140   {
00141     if (parent()->statement_type() == Statement::RULESET)
00142     { return bubble(m); }
00143 
00144     if (parent()->statement_type() == Statement::MEDIA)
00145     { return new (ctx.mem) Bubble(m->pstate(), m); }
00146 
00147     p_stack.push_back(m);
00148 
00149     Media_Block* mm = new (ctx.mem) Media_Block(m->pstate(),
00150                                                 m->media_queries(),
00151                                                 m->block()->perform(this)->block());
00152     mm->tabs(m->tabs());
00153 
00154     p_stack.pop_back();
00155 
00156     return debubble(mm->block(), mm)->block();
00157   }

00159   Statement* Cssize::operator()(Feature_Block* m)
00160   {
00161     if (!m->block()->length())
00162     { return m; }
00163 
00164     if (parent()->statement_type() == Statement::RULESET)
00165     { return bubble(m); }
00166 
00167     p_stack.push_back(m);
00168 
00169     Feature_Block* mm = new (ctx.mem) Feature_Block(m->pstate(),
00170                                                     m->feature_queries(),
00171                                                     m->block()->perform(this)->block());
00172     mm->tabs(m->tabs());
00173 
00174     p_stack.pop_back();
00175 
00176     return debubble(mm->block(), mm)->block();
00177   }

00179   Statement* Cssize::operator()(At_Root_Block* m)
00180   {
00181     bool tmp = false;
00182     for (size_t i = 0, L = p_stack.size(); i < L; ++i) {
00183       Statement* s = p_stack[i];
00184       tmp |= m->exclude_node(s);
00185     }
00186 
00187     if (!tmp)
00188     {
00189       Block* bb = m->block()->perform(this)->block();
00190       for (size_t i = 0, L = bb->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00191         // (bb->elements())[i]->tabs(m->tabs());
00192         if (bubblable((*bb)[i])) (*bb)[i]->tabs((*bb)[i]->tabs() + m->tabs());
00193       }
00194       if (bb->length() && bubblable(bb->last())) bb->last()->group_end(m->group_end());
00195       return bb;
00196     }
00197 
00198     if (m->exclude_node(parent()))
00199     {
00200       return new (ctx.mem) Bubble(m->pstate(), m);
00201     }
00202 
00203     return bubble(m);
00204   }

00206   Statement* Cssize::bubble(At_Rule* m)
00207   {
00208     Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(this->parent()->pstate());
00209     Has_Block* new_rule = static_cast<Has_Block*>(shallow_copy(this->parent()));
00210     new_rule->block(bb);
00211     new_rule->tabs(this->parent()->tabs());
00212 
00213     size_t L = m->block() ? m->block()->length() : 0;
00214     for (size_t i = 0; i < L; ++i) {
00215       *new_rule->block() << (*m->block())[i];
00216     }
00217 
00218     Block* wrapper_block = new (ctx.mem) Block(m->block() ? m->block()->pstate() : m->pstate());
00219     *wrapper_block << new_rule;
00220     At_Rule* mm = new (ctx.mem) At_Rule(m->pstate(),
00221                                         m->keyword(),
00222                                         m->selector(),
00223                                         wrapper_block);
00224     if (m->value()) mm->value(m->value());
00225 
00226     Bubble* bubble = new (ctx.mem) Bubble(mm->pstate(), mm);
00227     return bubble;
00228   }

00230   Statement* Cssize::bubble(At_Root_Block* m)
00231   {
00232     Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(this->parent()->pstate());
00233     Has_Block* new_rule = static_cast<Has_Block*>(shallow_copy(this->parent()));
00234     new_rule->block(bb);
00235     new_rule->tabs(this->parent()->tabs());
00236 
00237     for (size_t i = 0, L = m->block()->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00238       *new_rule->block() << (*m->block())[i];
00239     }
00240 
00241     Block* wrapper_block = new (ctx.mem) Block(m->block()->pstate());
00242     *wrapper_block << new_rule;
00243     At_Root_Block* mm = new (ctx.mem) At_Root_Block(m->pstate(),
00244                                                     wrapper_block,
00245                                                     m->expression());
00246 
00247     Bubble* bubble = new (ctx.mem) Bubble(mm->pstate(), mm);
00248     return bubble;
00249   }

00251   Statement* Cssize::bubble(Feature_Block* m)
00252   {
00253     Ruleset* parent = static_cast<Ruleset*>(shallow_copy(this->parent()));
00254 
00255     Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(parent->block()->pstate());
00256     Ruleset* new_rule = new (ctx.mem) Ruleset(parent->pstate(),
00257                                               parent->selector(),
00258                                               bb);
00259     new_rule->tabs(parent->tabs());
00260 
00261     for (size_t i = 0, L = m->block()->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00262       *new_rule->block() << (*m->block())[i];
00263     }
00264 
00265     Block* wrapper_block = new (ctx.mem) Block(m->block()->pstate());
00266     *wrapper_block << new_rule;
00267     Feature_Block* mm = new (ctx.mem) Feature_Block(m->pstate(),
00268                                                     m->feature_queries(),
00269                                                     wrapper_block);
00270 
00271     mm->tabs(m->tabs());
00272 
00273     Bubble* bubble = new (ctx.mem) Bubble(mm->pstate(), mm);
00274     return bubble;
00275   }

00277   Statement* Cssize::bubble(Media_Block* m)
00278   {
00279     Ruleset* parent = static_cast<Ruleset*>(shallow_copy(this->parent()));
00280 
00281     Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(parent->block()->pstate());
00282     Ruleset* new_rule = new (ctx.mem) Ruleset(parent->pstate(),
00283                                               parent->selector(),
00284                                               bb);
00285     new_rule->tabs(parent->tabs());
00286 
00287     for (size_t i = 0, L = m->block()->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00288       *new_rule->block() << (*m->block())[i];
00289     }
00290 
00291     Block* wrapper_block = new (ctx.mem) Block(m->block()->pstate());
00292     *wrapper_block << new_rule;
00293     Media_Block* mm = new (ctx.mem) Media_Block(m->pstate(),
00294                                                 m->media_queries(),
00295                                                 wrapper_block,
00296                                                 m->selector());
00297 
00298     mm->tabs(m->tabs());
00299 
00300     Bubble* bubble = new (ctx.mem) Bubble(mm->pstate(), mm);
00301 
00302     return bubble;
00303   }

00305   bool Cssize::bubblable(Statement* s)
00306   {
00307     return s->statement_type() == Statement::RULESET || s->bubbles();
00308   }
00309 
00310   Statement* Cssize::flatten(Statement* s)
00311   {
00312     Block* bb = s->block();
00313     Block* result = new (ctx.mem) Block(bb->pstate(), 0, bb->is_root());
00314     for (size_t i = 0, L = bb->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00315       Statement* ss = (*bb)[i];
00316       if (ss->block()) {
00317         ss = flatten(ss);
00318         for (size_t j = 0, K = ss->block()->length(); j < K; ++j) {
00319           *result << (*ss->block())[j];
00320         }
00321       }
00322       else {
00323         *result << ss;
00324       }
00325     }
00326     return result;
00327   }

00329   vector<pair<bool, Block*>> Cssize::slice_by_bubble(Statement* b)
00330   {
00331     vector<pair<bool, Block*>> results;
00332     for (size_t i = 0, L = b->block()->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00333       Statement* value = (*b->block())[i];
00334       bool key = value->statement_type() == Statement::BUBBLE;
00335 
00336       if (!results.empty() && results.back().first == key)
00337       {
00338         Block* wrapper_block = results.back().second;
00339         *wrapper_block << value;
00340       }
00341       else
00342       {
00343         Block* wrapper_block = new (ctx.mem) Block(value->pstate());
00344         *wrapper_block << value;
00345         results.push_back(make_pair(key, wrapper_block));
00346       }
00347     }
00348     return results;
00349   }

00351   Statement* Cssize::shallow_copy(Statement* s)
00352   {
00353     switch (s->statement_type())
00354     {
00355       case Statement::RULESET:
00356         return new (ctx.mem) Ruleset(*static_cast<Ruleset*>(s));
00357       case Statement::MEDIA:
00358         return new (ctx.mem) Media_Block(*static_cast<Media_Block*>(s));
00359       case Statement::BUBBLE:
00360         return new (ctx.mem) Bubble(*static_cast<Bubble*>(s));
00361       case Statement::DIRECTIVE:
00362         return new (ctx.mem) At_Rule(*static_cast<At_Rule*>(s));
00363       case Statement::FEATURE:
00364         return new (ctx.mem) Feature_Block(*static_cast<Feature_Block*>(s));
00365       case Statement::ATROOT:
00366         return new (ctx.mem) At_Root_Block(*static_cast<At_Root_Block*>(s));
00367       case Statement::KEYFRAMERULE:
00368         return new (ctx.mem) Keyframe_Rule(*static_cast<Keyframe_Rule*>(s));
00369       case Statement::NONE:
00370       default:
00371         error("unknown internal error; please contact the LibSass maintainers", s->pstate(), backtrace);
00372         String_Constant* msg = new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(ParserState("[WARN]"), string("`CSSize` can't clone ") + typeid(*s).name());
00373         return new (ctx.mem) Warning(ParserState("[WARN]"), msg);
00374     }
00375   }

00377   Statement* Cssize::debubble(Block* children, Statement* parent)
00378   {
00379     Has_Block* previous_parent = 0;
00380     vector<pair<bool, Block*>> baz = slice_by_bubble(children);
00381     Block* result = new (ctx.mem) Block(children->pstate());
00382 
00383     for (size_t i = 0, L = baz.size(); i < L; ++i) {
00384       bool is_bubble = baz[i].first;
00385       Block* slice = baz[i].second;
00386 
00387       if (!is_bubble) {
00388         if (!parent) {
00389           *result << slice;
00390         }
00391         else if (previous_parent) {
00392           *previous_parent->block() += slice;
00393         }
00394         else {
00395           previous_parent = static_cast<Has_Block*>(shallow_copy(parent));
00396           previous_parent->tabs(parent->tabs());
00397 
00398           Has_Block* new_parent = static_cast<Has_Block*>(shallow_copy(parent));
00399           new_parent->block(slice);
00400           new_parent->tabs(parent->tabs());
00401 
00402           *result << new_parent;
00403         }
00404         continue;
00405       }
00406 
00407       Block* wrapper_block = new (ctx.mem) Block(children->block()->pstate(),
00408                                                  children->block()->length(),
00409                                                  children->block()->is_root());
00410 
00411       for (size_t j = 0, K = slice->length(); j < K; ++j)
00412       {
00413         Statement* ss = 0;
00414         Bubble* b = static_cast<Bubble*>((*slice)[j]);
00415 
00416         if (!parent ||
00417             parent->statement_type() != Statement::MEDIA ||
00418             b->node()->statement_type() != Statement::MEDIA ||
00419             static_cast<Media_Block*>(b->node())->media_queries() == static_cast<Media_Block*>(parent)->media_queries())
00420         {
00421           ss = b->node();
00422         }
00423         else
00424         {
00425           List* mq = merge_media_queries(static_cast<Media_Block*>(b->node()), static_cast<Media_Block*>(parent));
00426           if (mq->length()) {
00427             static_cast<Media_Block*>(b->node())->media_queries(mq);
00428             ss = b->node();
00429           }
00430         }
00431 
00432         if (!ss) continue;
00433 
00434         ss->tabs(ss->tabs() + b->tabs());
00435         ss->group_end(b->group_end());
00436 
00437         if (!ss) continue;
00438 
00439         Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(children->block()->pstate(),
00440                                         children->block()->length(),
00441                                         children->block()->is_root());
00442         *bb << ss->perform(this);
00443         Statement* wrapper = flatten(bb);
00444         *wrapper_block << wrapper;
00445 
00446         if (wrapper->block()->length()) {
00447           previous_parent = 0;
00448         }
00449       }
00450 
00451       if (wrapper_block) {
00452         *result << flatten(wrapper_block);
00453       }
00454     }
00455 
00456     return flatten(result);
00457   }

00459   Statement* Cssize::fallback_impl(AST_Node* n)
00460   {
00461     return static_cast<Statement*>(n);
00462   }
00463 
00464   void Cssize::append_block(Block* b)
00465   {
00466     Block* current_block = block_stack.back();
00467 
00468     for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00469       Statement* ith = (*b)[i]->perform(this);
00470       if (ith && ith->block()) {
00471         for (size_t j = 0, K = ith->block()->length(); j < K; ++j) {
00472           *current_block << (*ith->block())[j];
00473         }
00474       }
00475       else if (ith) {
00476         *current_block << ith;
00477       }
00478     }
00479   }
00480 
00481   List* Cssize::merge_media_queries(Media_Block* m1, Media_Block* m2)
00482   {
00483     List* qq = new (ctx.mem) List(m1->media_queries()->pstate(),
00484                                   m1->media_queries()->length(),
00485                                   List::COMMA);
00486 
00487     for (size_t i = 0, L = m1->media_queries()->length(); i < L; i++) {
00488       for (size_t j = 0, K = m2->media_queries()->length(); j < K; j++) {
00489         Media_Query* mq1 = static_cast<Media_Query*>((*m1->media_queries())[i]);
00490         Media_Query* mq2 = static_cast<Media_Query*>((*m2->media_queries())[j]);
00491         Media_Query* mq = merge_media_query(mq1, mq2);
00492 
00493         if (mq) *qq << mq;
00494       }
00495     }
00496 
00497     return qq;
00498   }
00499 
00500 
00501   Media_Query* Cssize::merge_media_query(Media_Query* mq1, Media_Query* mq2)
00502   {
00503     To_String to_string(&ctx);
00504 
00505     string type;
00506     string mod;
00507 
00508     string m1 = string(mq1->is_restricted() ? "only" : mq1->is_negated() ? "not" : "");
00509     string t1 = mq1->media_type() ? mq1->media_type()->perform(&to_string) : "";
00510     string m2 = string(mq2->is_restricted() ? "only" : mq1->is_negated() ? "not" : "");
00511     string t2 = mq2->media_type() ? mq2->media_type()->perform(&to_string) : "";
00512 
00513 
00514     if (t1.empty()) t1 = t2;
00515     if (t2.empty()) t2 = t1;
00516 
00517     if ((m1 == "not") ^ (m2 == "not")) {
00518       if (t1 == t2) {
00519         return 0;
00520       }
00521       type = m1 == "not" ? t2 : t1;
00522       mod = m1 == "not" ? m2 : m1;
00523     }
00524     else if (m1 == "not" && m2 == "not") {
00525       if (t1 != t2) {
00526         return 0;
00527       }
00528       type = t1;
00529       mod = "not";
00530     }
00531     else if (t1 != t2) {
00532       return 0;
00533     } else {
00534       type = t1;
00535       mod = m1.empty() ? m2 : m1;
00536     }
00537 
00538     Media_Query* mm = new (ctx.mem) Media_Query(
00539       mq1->pstate(), 0,
00540       mq1->length() + mq2->length(), mod == "not", mod == "only"
00541     );
00542 
00543     if (!type.empty()) {
00544       mm->media_type(new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(mq1->pstate(), type));
00545     }
00546 
00547     *mm += mq2;
00548     *mm += mq1;
00549     return mm;
00550   }
